mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of George Brooke. He is wearing the uniform of an artillery captain. Pose 4 shows him in a uniform overcoat. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of George Brooke (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
